column4: ok, doing well, got wireless network up, mounted remote "movies" directory, now this "Dragon Player" seems to not be playing the file? just black screen and the timer is ticking...
Have you gotten ubuntu-restricted-extras and the css thingie?
i have no idea what you are talking about, so i would guess no, any more info you can provide?
sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras ; sudo apt-get install libdvdcss2
